body.name: Amzelas Instant Print Camera for Kids Christmas Birthday Gift for Girls Boys Age 3-12 Toddler Zero Ink Print Photo Toy Instant Cameras for 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 Year Old, 2.4 inch Screen with 32GB Card (Pink)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 1 hr 38 mins
features: 📸【Multifunctional Selfie Digital Camera for Kids】The 2.4-inch screen enables easy viewing and playback of photos and videos. Along with instant printing, this camera boasts a wide range of other features, 1080P video recording, 15 filter frames, 16X digital zoom, flash, time-lapse, continuous shooting, games, selfie mirror, and mp3 playback. Your kids will have endless fun and entertainment with this camera.

📸【Instant Print Camera For Toddlers Zero Ink】The Kids Instant Print Camera utilizes thermal printing technology, eliminating the need for ink cartridges and toners. With just one key to shoot and one key to print, your kids will have a blast capturing memories and printing them out in an instant black and white photos. This camera enables the storage of color photos on the SD card. This activity helps cultivate children's imagination and creativity.

🌈【Portable & Durable】This instant print camera is compact and easy to take anywhere. It also comes with 3 rolls of printing paper, allowing children to freely draw on their photos, capturing their creativity and imagination. Moreover, you can easily transfer your pictures and videos to your computer using the included type-c cable. The Instant Print Camera provides continuous photo-taking and recording for 2-3 hours.

🎁【Great Gift For Kids】Our Kids Instant Print Camera is the ideal gift for 3-12-year-old girls and boys. Whether it's for birthdays, New Year, 🎅Christmas, Thanksgiving, holidays, or trips, this camera will bring endless joy and excitement. Let your child have their own toy camera and eliminate the need for them to use your smartphone.

📸 【Safety & Accessories】This camera is made with safe and environmentally friendly materials, ensuring hours of worry-free fun for your child. The package includes: 1 kids print camera, 1 32GB SD card, 3 rolls print paper, 1 Type-C charging cable, 1 lanyard, and 1 user manual. Our worry-free 1 year warranty, and friendly customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased for my 6 year old granddaughter for Christmas. She loves this camera and has been taking a lot of pictures. Great quality picture. Perfect tone not too dark not to light. She saves every picture right now. Love how easy to use. She figured out games. Pictures etc quick. Charging time is not long. Best gift I bought this year.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is an amazing little camera!
reviews.reviewText: I have 10 grandkids and thought I would get them one of these print cameras. I have ordered several other different brand cameras and had to send back 3 of them because of how bad they printed. Of all of the different cameras I bought this one is the BEST! It prints the best quality and is actually cheaper than a couple of the other ones I purchased. It even has a flash, can zoom in and out, has a selfie mirror on the front with flash. I haven't tried the video yet or the other fun things with the camera but I bought this for the photo and print and it works beautifully! I would recommend! 5 Stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for 8 year old!
reviews.reviewText: Great size for 8 year old! She loves the pictures and the camera. She also loves that the camera came with a set of markers to draw or write on the edges of the photos and that the camera is equipped with games.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars total blast for adult babies
reviews.reviewText: i am solidly outside of the intended age bracket here, and i love this thing. the purple/orange color scheme is so very cute. the shape and size is super cute and comfortable to hold.the camera itself of course isn't the best quality ever. it goes up to 8mpx, which can honestly produce good photos in my experience, but the lens is what you'd expect from this pricepoint, and i don't mind one bit. it adds character! very simple to transfer the images to my computer.it's a bit annoying that it sets to auto print photos every time you turn the camera on, but i just got used to turning it off. the paper's so cheap, i don't really care how much i waste. just be aware that, same as receipts, the printed photos will eventually fade, and there's absolutely no way to stop that. but again, it's very easy to transfer the images from the SD card (32gb mind you!) that i don't really care.it also annoys me that i can't adjust the date and time. or rather, i can, but every single time the camera turns off, it snaps right back to february of 2023, so i just gave up. i don't really care, but if the date stamp matters to you, i'd maybe check out a different thermal printing camera.anyways, this thing is cute, durable, and does what it says it will. i take it with me to places sometimes and people think it's so fun. i got it on sale for 30 bucks and don't regret it one bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars He has not put this down once.
reviews.reviewText: Early Valentines gift for my 10 year old grandson. He went crazy, loves this camera with its games and apps, so much. I love it because it's so easy he can do everything on his own, including load the paper. This was a FIND because most kid cameras have to use expensive photo papers or ink. Very economical, thermal printing, his ex-service veteran dad recognized this immediately. Wonderful gift works perfectly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Will iy take award-winning photos? Certainly not. Will it take color photos? Nope. Do I love it? Yup
reviews.reviewText: This is a great first camera. My young daughter and all her friends love it. She’s under 5 and mastered it in no time. Just load a roll of the pretty well-priced thermal paper and start pushing the button. Boom! Photos. Sure, they are small, black&white and not the best quality but I find that rather charming. It’s ton of fun to be able to take as many pictures as you want and get them instantly. Great purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little camera!
reviews.reviewText: Love this little camera! Especially for the price.. who needs a Polaroid?? Pictures are clear and camera is very easy to navigate making it a great gift for kids (even grown ups) 🖤

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great kids camara
reviews.reviewText: This is the best. It not only is a camera it also has games on it. It is great they have a choice if the want to print the picture or just keep it. I bought for my 4 yo grandson but I think his older siblings will use it more often, they were totally impressed! Great buy!
